description: This file defines a Dart class NotificationItem representing a notification with properties like id, userId, message, and read status. It includes methods for JSON serialization and deserialization.

classes.name: NotificationItem
classes.description: An immutable class representing a notification item with serialization to and from JSON.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a NotificationItem instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the NotificationItem instance into a JSON map.
